description: Airport West offers great discounts for school and group bookings ranging from 20 - 190 people. They offer Birthday Party Packages which include a great deal on movie tickets and candy bar items.
parkingInfo: Ample rooftop parking available at Westfield Shoppingtown.

description: Heritage trust building with mega screen, Dolby Digital Surround Sound in select auditoriums, movie dine-out deals and corporate discounts available. For more local offers and information please visit www.regentcinemas.net.au
parkingInfo: 3 hour and all day parking readily available.

description: All auditoriums have wall to wall screens, stadium seating, state of the art Dolby Digital Surround Sound capabilities, love seats, and warm friendly staff on hand to cater for all your needs.
parkingInfo: 4 hour parking located 200 metres from the Kings Way entrance.

description: For a night of good old fashioned movie fun, bring your family or a carload of friends to the Village Drive-In. Kids under 12 also get in free all year round! We screen a variety of blockbusters projected onto the huge 33 metre wide screens, and sound is picked up through your car's FM stereo broadcast.
parkingInfo: 900 parking spots so you can watch under the stars.

description: Situated within the Crown Casino complex, on the Yarra Promenade. In the heart of Southbank, Crown now offers a powerful and dramatic new cinema sound experience that is at the top of its class, with DOLBY ATMOS. Experience the sound as it moves around the theatre. Now fully licensed! Get your tasty beverages from the candy bar.
parkingInfo: West End Car Park, corner of Clarendon & Whiteman St. Crown basement car park. Melbourne Exhibition Centre.

description: Village Cinemas Doncaster boasts state of the art facilities focused on style, design, technology and comfort. It includes 9 screens: 3 luxurious Gold Class cinemas, 1 Cinema Europa screen, and a huge Vmax auditorium. Parking is now ticketless at Westfield Doncaster. Bought your ticket online? Show your online ticket to a staff member in cinema who will give you a barcode that will allow you to validate your parking for an extra hour.
parkingInfo: Parking is now ticketless at Westfield Doncaster. Ample parking in the shopping centre. Two main entry points: Doncaster Rd and Williamsons Rd. You get four hours of free parking if you attend a movie at Village Cinemas Doncaster and validate your ticket at the Village Cinemas ticket box, located on level 2. Bought your ticket online? Show your online ticket to a staff member in cinema who will give you a barcode that will allow you to validate your parking for an extra hour.

description: Level access to all cinemas. Digital sound capabilities in all auditoriums. Adjacent to Eastlands Shopping Centre.
parkingInfo: Ample free parking surrounding cinema complex.

description: Come along and experience first class luxury in our newest Gold Class cinemas with recliner chairs, delicious food and beverages, and your own personal waiter. The ultimate cinema experience is now available at Fountain Gate. Vjunior, now open at Village Cinemas Fountain Gate.
parkingInfo: Shared rooftop and under cover car park spaces available.

description: All new and all for you! We have re-launched our cinemas with a brand new look. Village Cinemas Geelong caters for school and group bookings, conference facilities, product launches, private screenings and birthday parties. Our aim is to exceed the expectations of our patrons with outstanding customer service every time you visit our cinemas.
parkingInfo: Parking available at Market Square car park during shopping centre hours. Parking also available underneath the cinema or at the Church car park after 6.00pm weekdays, all weekend and on public holidays.

description: Digital sound capabilities in all auditoriums.
parkingInfo: Ample free parking at surrounding sites.

description: Vpremium and Vmax are now open at Village Cinemas Hobart. Dolby Digital Surround Sound and stadium seating in selected auditoriums. Delivers the finest Hollywood releases combined with a selection of great arthouse presentations. Please note that due to our ongoing refurbishment Cinema 2 is not accessible to patrons in wheelchairs or who experience difficulty walking. Our Vpremium & Gold Class cinemas are fully-licensed.
parkingInfo: Adjacent carpark open from 8.30am until cinema closes.

description: State-of-the-ART facilities in a relaxed, cosmopolitan environment in the heart of South Yarra. Features six 3D screens, two Vpremium cinemas, one Vmax cinema and Gold Class cinemas, all with digital sound capabilities. See it in style where movies mean more at South Yarra's most popular cinema.  NOTE: Due to technical difficulties there are LIMITED CLOSED CAPTION films (for hearing impaired patrons) at the Jam Factory Cinema until further notice. All other film types are screening as normal.
parkingInfo: The Jam Factory Carpark offers security surveillance, 24 hr access,˜early bird rates, specials, and 970 spaces. Safe, secure and affordable in South Yarra - it's the smart parking choice for Village Cinemas Jam Factory customers.

description: Karingal is the star venue in the entertainment precinct adjacent to Karingal Hub Shopping Centre called Star Zone. It boasts 5 traditional cinemas, 3 glorious Gold Class theatres, Cinema Europa and a huge Vmax auditorium. The movie going experience doesn't get any bigger than this! The candy bar features all the traditional movie fanfare of popcorn and drinks, plus delicious hot food.
parkingInfo: 2000 free car parking spaces available at the complex.

description: Village Cinemas Knox boasts 15 screens: 2 luxurious Gold Class cinemas, 2 Vjunior cinemas, 2 Cinema Europa screens, 9 state of the art cinemas, and a huge Vmax auditorium. A standout in the Knox O-Zone entertainment precinct, the state-of-the-art Village Cinemas Knox is a benchmark in the movie going experience!
parkingInfo: Multi-level carpark located behind Knox Tavern. If arriving via Burwood Hwy, use entrance #5 near the tower point.

description: Digital Sound capabilities in all auditoriums.
parkingInfo: Street parking surrounding the cinema. Multi-level carpark 50 metres from the cinema.

description: Located in the heart of Gippsland, Village Cinemas Morwell is the largest and most modern of all the cinema complexes in the area. Dolby Digital Surround Sound is available for selected sessions, plus we have a large coin-operated gaming area.
Village Cinemas Plenty Valley is now open, featuring Gold Class, Vpremium, Vmax & Vjunior cinemas. There's a world of movie experiences for everyone!
parkingInfo: Cinema parking available.

description: As a stunning example of Art Deco style architecture, Rivoli is the premium location for a night out at the movies. Rivoli theatres showcase the latest in contemporary and arthouse film offerings. Rivoli is proud to introduce "nineteenforty", a new bar situated on the Rivoli rooftop.  Offering panoramic views of Camberwell & Hawthorn, the rooftop bar compliments the gorgeous art-deco architecture with a garden inspired fit out. This venue is perfect for sipping champagne in summer or curling up under umbrellas and heaters in the winter.
parkingInfo: Free 3 hour parking, all day at Junction West Carpark on Harold Street. Evenings after 6pm some unrestricted parking Junction West, Camberwell Rd or Evans Place.

description: Dolby Digital Surround Sound in all cinemas.
parkingInfo: Street parking surrounding the cinema. Multi-level car park opposite the cinema. 26 spaces in council car park next to the cinema.

description: Features 3 Gold Class cinemas, 4 Cinema Europa theatres, 2 huge Vmax auditoriums, 2 Vjunior cinemas, 2 Vpremium cinemas and Dolby Digital Surround Sound capabilities in every cinema.
parkingInfo: Ample cinema parking available.

description: Village Cinemas Sunshine boasts 20 screens, with a movie experience for everyone. Choose from our concept cinemas including Gold Class, Vmax & Vjunior. All theatres have the latest technology with Dolby Digital Surround Sound. Large capacity auditoriums with stadium seating and wall to wall mega screens.
parkingInfo: Free parking available at Sunshine Marketplace Shopping Centre.

description: Gold Class is now open at Village Cinemas Werribee. Cinemas feature Dolby Digital Surround Sound and large wall to wall screens. Please note, parking at Werribee Plaza and access to the cinema has changed.
parkingInfo: Werribee Plaza Shopping Centre car park.
